ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Max Acceleration' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

selection_policy.rule: If one measurement remains after selecting the best mode OR all remaining are within tolerance_ms for the same mode, set scalar to median; else unk with conflicting_sources_unresolved.

ui.label: Click Latency
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Click Latency' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Click Latency (By Mode)
ui.tooltip_md: Click latency values by mode when available. Rare; do not guess. Structured list preferred: e.g., '1.1 wired, 1.3 wireless'.

ui.label: Coating
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Coating' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Colors
ui.tooltip_md: Colorway tokens. Use list<string>. Normalize greyâ†’gray; multi-colorways may use '+'.

ui.label: Computer-side Connector
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Computer-side Connector' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Connection
ui.tooltip_md: Primary connection mode (wired/wireless/hybrid/bluetooth). Prefer manufacturer docs.

ui.label: Connectivity
ui.tooltip_md: Connectivity options (e.g., 2.4GHz, Bluetooth, USB). Use list if multiple.

ui.label: Debounce
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Debounce' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Discontinued' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Max DPI
ui.tooltip_md: Max DPI (or max CPI) as integer. Do not list steps; store maximum unless field_rules later adds a steps field.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Encoder' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.tooltip_md: Lift-off distance (LOD) in mm. May be a range or set; normalize ranges to {min,max}.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Lift Settings' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Polling Rate
ui.tooltip_md: Polling rate options in Hz. Normalize to list of integers, sorted ascending; common values: 125/250/500/1000/2000/4000/8000.

parse.notes: Prefer MSRP bracket tokens like '0-50', '50-100', or '$99'. Keep as string; numeric parsing is category-specific.

ui.label: Price (MSRP)
ui.tooltip_md: MSRP price bracket or stated MSRP. Keep as a string token; do not guess if not public.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Profile Switching' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: RGB
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'RGB' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

ui.label: Sensor
ui.tooltip_md: Sensor model (component DB-backed). Must be evidence-backed; avoid wrong-variant merges.

ui.label: Sensor Brand
ui.tooltip_md: Sensor manufacturer brand (e.g., PixArt). Prefer component DB if sensor identified.

ui.label: Sensor Date
ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Date' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

selection_policy.rule: If deterministic selection is possible (single mode + within tolerance), set scalar; else unk.

ui.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Latency' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.
